rows.label: tlk70000052_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Adel-sama! I need to tell you... I've
set a day to visit my grandmother.

rows.label: tlk70000052_02_msg0002
rows.name:
It won't be a nice trip back home, mind.
Actually, she's not well, and we'll need
the services of an Superbian doctor.

rows.label: tlk70000052_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll be away from Iira for a time,
while I provide her with support...

rows.label: tlk70000052_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Montos and the household staff have
even prepared some flowers for her...
Forgive me, my eyes are leaking...

rows.label: tlk70000052_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Everyone in Aletta has been so kind,
and I still have to say my goodbyes,
so I'll be around a little while longer...

rows.label: tlk70000052_02_msg0006
rows.name:
Thankfully I've a little more time to
soak in this Iiran scenery.

rows.label: tlk70000052_02_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm dreading having to leave everyone,
Adel-sama included. The people here
have been so kind to me! It's too hard!
